The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely related to an unseen and ancient race: The Roman group had gotten involved with possible living mummies under the desert.
Actors: Suki Godway, Sibweni Mdolanya
Directors: Stu Mackenzie
